Name: Memory Of Death
Flavor: That moment is etched in your soul for all eternity
Effect: During the Trauma Draw, treat your @Danger as 1 higher
Growth Ability: If you fully evade an attack, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Betrayal
Flavor: The soft sweet lies, the hard sharp truth. Never again
Effect: You cannot voluntarily end your movement no a space adjacent to another Titan
Growth Ability: If you start and end your turn adjacent to a Titan, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Alone
Flavor: There was no one there for you
Effect: <Start of your turn> If you're more than 5 spaces from all other Titans, gain +2 @Fate
Growth Ability: <Start of your turn> If all Titans are within 4 spaces of you, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Left Behind
Flavor: You were just a burden to them
Effect: You cannot be the last one to take your turn during the Titan Round, unless there are no other living Titans
Growth Ability: If you take your turn last during the Titan Round, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Oblivious
Flavor: Huh?
Effect: You don't benefit from Opening tokens
Growth Ability: When you are about to attack, if there are 3+ Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Ikari
Flavor: I don't want to do this..
Effect: You must be the last one to take your turn during the Titan Round
Growth Ability: If you take your turn first during the Titan Round, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Honorblind
Flavor: Honor has its place, but you've misplaced it
Effect: You cannot end voluntary movement in a Rear space
Growth Ability: When you are about to attack, if you are on a Rear space, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Egotist
Flavor: You see it so clearly. Scion of legend. Yours should be the glory
Effect: You must be the first one to take your turn during the Titan Round
Growth Ability: <End of your turn> If you did not attack this turn, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Selfishness
Flavor: You were nobility once. Yes, you must've been
Effect: You cannot place tokens in the Kratos Pool
Growth Ability: When you are about to attack, if the Kratos Pool is empty, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Hapless
Flavor: The World just seems out to get you
Effect: Apply a -1 penalty to all tests you perform (note: rolls are not tests)
Growth Ability: When you fail a test, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Weak
Flavor: It's always you..
Effect: <Start of Battle> Gain the [Marked for Death|AM0323] Major Trauma card
Growth Ability: When you gain the Priority Target token, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Coward
Flavor: They left you in the mountains, like they do with all the weaklings
Effect: When you are about to draw an Obol, add an Obol card from the next threshold on the Massive Danger Chart to the Obol Deck for this draw only
Growth Ability: When you survive an Obol, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Reluctant
Flavor: You have no stomach for this
Effect: If you are in front of the Primordial, you have -1 Precision
Growth Ability: End of your turn: If you are in front and adjacent to the Primordial, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Scapegoat
Flavor: You'd have nothing to do with the barbarism
Effect: You cannot use @Gear cards with the following traits: _Axe, Blade, Javelin, Khopesh, Knife, Lance, Spear, Sword_
Growth Ability: When you deal a Wound, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Restless
Flavor: The wait is killing you!
Effect: You must always use your @MovementAction to move at least one space
Growth Ability: End of your turn: If you didn't voluntarily move this turn, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Ambrosia Addiction
Flavor: Just one more sip..
Effect: {Ambrosia Limit -1}
Growth Ability: When you discard at least 1 Ambrosia token, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Bloodthirsty
Flavor: You will kill every last one of them!
Effect: You can use your @CombatAction only to perform attacks
Growth Ability: End of your turn: If you didn't attack this turn, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Clumsy
Flavor: Things break so easily when you're around
Effect: You cannot unexhaust your @Gear cards
Growth Ability: When you involuntarily exhaust a @Gear card, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Psychosomatic Disorder
Flavor: You just can't pinpoint the pain - but it's there..
Effect: When you draw a positive Truma card, ignore it and draw again (once per Trauma Draw)
Growth Ability: When you draw a negative Trauma card, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Apathy
Flavor: The passion is gone
Effect: You cannot use @Fate Rerolls
Growth Ability: If you rerolled 2 or more Attack Dice and none of them are hits, lost -1 Fate

Name: Fate-Hexed
Flavor: The Moirai have curse you
Effect: You cannot gain Crit Chances
Growth Ability: When you gain a Crit Chance, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Timid
Flavor: Not you, please, not you..
Effect: When you gain the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token, gain +1 @Fate
Growth Ability: When you lsoe the Priority Target token, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Enervated
Flavor: You're so tired all the time..
Effect: <Start of Battle> Gain 1 @CombatAction or @MovementAction Fatigue token
Growth Ability: When you gain a @CombatAction or @MovementAction Fatigue token,, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Superstitous
Flavor: This will not be your day, the Oracles have spoken
Effect: You cannot ignore or re-draw Trauma cards
Growth Ability: If you re-draw a Trauma card or otherwise ignore its effect, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Queasy
Flavor: You have seen too much blood already..
Effect: When you gain at least 1 Bleeding token, gain +1 Bleeding token
Growth Ability: When you gain at least 1 Bleeding token, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Late
Flavor: You arrived too late. Or too soon..
Effect: During the Titan Round, you cannot voluntarily be the first or last to take your turn
Growth Ability: When you take your turn second or third during the Titan Round, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Denigrated
Flavor: You were worthless. At least that's what your father told you
Effect: After you place any tokens in the Kratos Pool, remove 1 token from the Kratos Pool
Growth Ability: When you place 5+ Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool in a single ability window, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Cursed
Flavor: You covet that which gleams like the Sun
Effect: Gain the Goldthirst Curse Affliction. When you gain at least 1 Midas token, gain +1 @Fate
Growth Ability: When you discard or turn (into another token) at least 1 Midas token, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Twice-Cursed
Flavor: You're as light as a feather--and just as fickle
Effect: Gain the Windblight Curse Affliction. When you suffer involuntary movement, Knockdown, or Float, gain +1 @Fate
Growth Ability: When you stand up, deflate, or arrive form Time-clocked, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Thrice-Cursed
Flavor: You see things
Effect: At the end of your turn, if you didn't move your full @Speed value or use all of your available Hermes Moves, gain +1 @Fate
Growth Ability: When you move your full @Speed value or use all of your available Hermes Moves, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Fear of Heights
Flavor: Don't look down
Effect: When on an Elevated space or a VP, you gain -1 Precision and *Crit Fail:* {Knockdown} (end your attack)
Growth Ability: When you successfully perform a Climb test, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Wishful Thinker
Flavor: I've got this!
Effect: When you Wound, after Escalation, if the AI card on the top of the AI deck isn't an AI III or IV, shuffle the AI deck (once per Wound)
Growth Ability: When you take your turn last during the Titan Round, if you shuffle the BP deck, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Deprived
Flavor: That spark that burns in others--you don't have it
Effect: You cannot Awaken. You cannot summon during your turn
Growth Ability: When you Awaken or Summon during your turn, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Hoarder
Flavor: I need that
Effect: You cannot voluntarily discard tokens and card
Growth Ability: When you discard a @Gear card, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Indebted
Flavor: Taxes trump death
Effect: When you gain at least 1 Condition token or Ambrosia token, gain 1 more of that token
Growth Ability: When you gain at least 3 Condition tokens or Ambrosia tokens from a single source, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Expendable
Flavor: Your robes are daubed crimson
Effect: You cannot re-draw Obol cards
Growth Ability: If you draw an Obol and don't re-draw it, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Sanctimonious
Flavor: I know what's best for us
Effect: You cannot equip @Gear with the Light X keyword
Growth Ability: When you place Ambrosia tokens on your @Gear cards, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Delusional
Flavor: They want to poison us
Effect: When your Attack hits, but before revealing the BP card, guess the @AT. If you guess incorrectly, gain 1 Ambrosia token
Growth Ability: When your Attack hits, but before revealing the BP card, guess the @AT. If you guess correctly, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Dogmatic
Flavor: This would be sacrilege
Effect: You cannot use Aether tokens in any way
Growth Ability: When you use Aether tokens, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Humiliated
Flavor: Nobody will tell you you're a coward!
Effect: You cannot voluntarily move away from the Primordial
Growth Ability: When you move away from the Primordial with a @MovementAction, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Depressed
Flavor: You cannot go on this way..
Effect: <Start of your turn> Gain 1 Despair token
Growth Ability: When you gain 2+ Despair tokens from one source, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Memory of Drowning
Flavor: The worst death
Effect: You cannot gain additional Oxygen tokens
Growth Ability: When you discard or spend Oxygen tokens (but not flip them!), lose -1 @Fate

Name: Phantom Pain
Flavor: I still feel it
Effect: When you draw a Trauma card, gain 1 Pain
Growth Ability: When you gain 2+ Pain tokens from one source, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Godfearing
Flavor: This is their punishment
Effect: When you gain a negative Mind Condition card, gain 1 negative Precision token
Growth Ability: When you gain a Mind Condition card, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Messianic
Flavor: My death was promised
Effect: When you are about to draw an Obol, add an additional _You died_ Obol to the Obol deck (for this draw only)
Growth Ability: When you survive an Obol Draw from 3 or more Obol cards, lose -1 @Fate

Name: Sowed
Flavor: You feel something moving beyond the horizon. Something in you has irrevocably changed
Effect: Conqueror Nail and Repurposed Cryptex gain the {Argonaut Possession} keyword. During an Attack Roll, treat a '1' rolled on any of your dice as a Crit Miss (it may result in Crit Miss effects triggering multiple times). You cannot lose this Fated Mnemos, only resolve it
Growth Ability: Resolve the Reaped Special Event in the Cycle II Storybook
